feats.name: Further Backgrounding
feats.description: Add 2 total points to your backgrounds, or 2 new points of backgrounds.

feats.name: Further Backgrounding
feats.description: Add 3 total points to your backgrounds, or 3 new points of backgrounds.

feats.name: Further Backgrounding
feats.description: Add 2 total points to your backgrounds, or 2 new points of backgrounds. You can raise one background to 7.

feats.name: Imp. Initiative
feats.description: +4 to initiative checks.

feats.name: Linguist
feats.description: Speak all normal humanoid languages well enough.

feats.name: Linguist
feats.description: Speak, read, and write normal languages fluently; and speak bizarre languages no one else can deal with.

feats.name: Precise Shot
feats.description: Ranged attacks won’t hit engaged allies.

feats.name: Rapid Reload
feats.description: Quick action to reload heavy crossbow; free action to reload light or hand crossbow.

feats.name: Reach Tricks
feats.description: Once per battle, use a reach weapon in a special way.

feats.name: Ritual Casting
feats.description: Cast spells you know as rituals.

feats.name: Skill Escalation
feats.description: Add the escalation die to your skill checks after seeing roll; 2/day.

feats.name: Strong Recovery
feats.description: Reroll one die when rolling recovery dice. At 5th level, reroll 2 dice. At 8th level, reroll three dice.

feats.name: Toughness
feats.description: Gain bonus hp equal to half your class baseline hp; improves at 5th and 8th level.

feats.name: Cruel
feats.description: Once per day, use cruel to deal 5 ongoing damage per level against a target you miss or you roll a natural odd attack roll against (even a 1).

feats.name: Breath Weapon
feats.description: Breath weapon now targets 1d3 enemies in a nearby group.

feats.name: That's Your Best Shot?
feats.description: If escalation die is 2+, the best shot recovery is free.

feats.name: Heritage of the Sword
feats.description: Use d6 and d8 swords without penalties; or if already able to use such swords without penalties, +2 melee damage.

feats.name: Confounding
feats.description: Target of confounding is weakened instead of dazed.

feats.name: Surprising
feats.description: Use surprising an extra time, but only to change a nearby ally's d20 roll.

feats.name: Evasive
feats.description: The foe's reroll when you use evasive takes a –5 penalty.

feats.name: Lethal
feats.description: If lethal attack reroll is 16+, use lethal again that battle.

feats.name: Highblood Teleport
feats.description: When you teleport, deal damage equal to twice your level to engaged enemy.

feats.name: Halo
feats.description: Halo now activates whenever you heal using a recovery.

feats.name: Quick to Fight
feats.description: Increase escalation die by +1 when you roll natural 19 or 20 for initiative.

feats.name: Never Say Die
feats.description: When you roll 16+ on your never say die save, take an extra standard action next turn.

feats.name: Curse of Chaos
feats.description: Use curse of chaos for free when a nearby enemy gets a natural 1 attack roll.

feats.name: Elven Grace
feats.description: Start your elven grace rolls with a d4 instead of a d6.

feats.name: Barbarian Rage
feats.description: When esc die is 4+, start raging for free as a quick action.

feats.name: Barbarian Rage
feats.description: Now start raging for free when esc. die is 3+.

feats.name: Barbarian Rage
feats.description: Now start raging for free when esc. die is 2+.

feats.name: Anc.Warband
feats.description: The warband fights for 1 round even after you are unconscious.

feats.name: Barbaric Cleave
feats.description: Gain +2 bonus to Barbaric Cleave attacks, and on a hit with Barbaric Cleave, you can heal using a recovery.

feats.name: Barbaric Cleave
feats.description: You can move for free before using a Barbaric Cleave attack.

feats.name: Barbaric Cleave
feats.description: Use Barbaric Cleave as often as you want in one battle.

feats.name: Building Frenzy
feats.description: The bonus damage dice are now d6s instead of d4s.

feats.name: Building Frenzy
feats.description: The bonus damage dice are now d10s instead of d6s.

feats.name: Building Frenzy
feats.description: Use Building Frenzy twice per day now.

feats.name: Natural Will
feats.description: Use Natural Will twice per day now.

feats.name: Natural Will
feats.description: Bonus increases to +4 MD.

feats.name: Natural Will
feats.description: Use Natural Will as a free action, even as a reaction to an attack.

feats.name: Relentless
feats.description: Gain resist damage 12+ until next turn after you crit.

feats.name: Slayer
feats.description: Gain +2 bonus to Slayer attacks.

feats.name: Slayer
feats.description: Once per battle, deal Slayer damage on a miss.

feats.name: Slayer
feats.description: Gain 20 temp hp when your Slayer attack drops a non-mook enemy.

feats.name: Strongheart
feats.description: Increase your maximum recoveries by 1.

feats.name: Strongheart
feats.description: You gain +1 PD and when you heal using a recovery, you can roll a save.

feats.name: Strongheart
feats.description: Increase your maximum recoveries by 1 (2 total).

feats.name: Unstoppable
feats.description: The recovery from your Unstoppable attack is free.

feats.name: Unstoppable
feats.description: Add 2 x Con mod to the total healing from the Unstoppable recovery.

feats.name: Unstoppable
feats.description: Use Unstoppable twice per battle now.

feats.name: Violence
feats.description: Deal half damage with missed attacks when you use Violence.

feats.name: Violence
feats.description: Attack roll bonus using Violence increases to +1d6 from +1d4.

feats.name: Whirlwind
feats.description: Deal normal miss damage with missed Whirlwind attacks.

feats.name: Whirlwind
feats.description: Penalty to AC and PD from Whirlwind is now –2. Disengage attempts after using Whirlwind succeed automatically.

feats.name: Whirlwind
feats.description: Use Whirlwind anytime during your turn now.

feats.name: Bardic Songs
feats.description: Songs continue for one round when you are silenced, stunned, or unconscious.

feats.name: Battle Cries
feats.description: Use your 1st or 3rd level battle cries without making a melee attack.

feats.name: Balladeer
feats.description: First time you use the ballad-created relationship, 5s become 6s. +2 to Balladeer checks.

feats.name: Balladeer
feats.description: Sing two ballads a day.

feats.name: Balladeer
feats.description: Gain 3 or 4 bonus dice at the cost of an equal number of cursed dice with each enemy.

feats.name: Battle Skald
feats.description: Once per day, use battle cries on yourself.

feats.name: Battle Skald
feats.description: Battle cries used on yourself also help an ally.

feats.name: Battle Skald
feats.description: Once per battle, reroll an attack meant to trigger a battle cry.

feats.name: Jack of Spells
feats.description: Gain 3 cantrips if you choose wizard; gain dancing lights if you choose sorcerer. Also use Charisma for attack and damage bonuses with the spell you’ve jacked.

feats.name: Jack of Spells
feats.description: Jack another spell from a second other spell-casting class.

feats.name: Jack of Spells
feats.description: Jack another spell from a third other spell-casting class.

feats.name: Hang Tough!
feats.description: If the ally is staggered, double hang tough temporary hp.

feats.name: Hang Tough!
feats.description: Add your level to the temporary hp (before any doubling for being staggered).

feats.name: Hang Tough!
feats.description: You can be the target of hang tough.

feats.name: It's All Yours!
feats.description: Your ally's attack also deals +1d6 damage.

feats.name: It's All Yours!
feats.description: Damage bonus increases to +3d6.

feats.name: It's All Yours!
feats.description: Damage bonus increases to +3d12.

feats.name: Move It!
feats.description: Your allies gain a +2 bonus to move it disengage checks.

feats.name: Move It!
feats.description: Bonus increases to +5.

feats.name: Move It!
feats.description: Ally can pop free of one enemy automatically before rolling disengage.

feats.name: Pull It Together!
feats.description: Target ally also heals +1d4 hp per point of escalation die.

feats.name: Pull It Together!
feats.description: Battle cry now triggers on any natural even roll; healing increases to +1d6 per point.

feats.name: Pull It Together!
feats.description: Use the battle cry 3 times per battle; healing increases to +1d10 per point.

feats.name: Stay Strong!
feats.description: The AC bonus also applies to PD.

feats.name: Stay Strong!
feats.description: The AC bonus also applies to MD.

feats.name: Stay Strong!
feats.description: Bonus increases to +4.

feats.name: The Time Is Now
feats.description: The battle cry now triggers on a natural 18+ instead of 19+.

feats.name: They Fall Before Us!
feats.description: The battle cry now triggers on a natural 19+ instead of 20+.

feats.name: Victory is Ours!
feats.description: Trigger is now 3+ on the escalation die instead of 5+.

feats.name: Victory is Ours!
feats.description: Allies' damage bonus is now +3d12.

feats.name: We Need You!
feats.description: The battle cry save now gets a +1 bonus.

feats.name: We Need You!
feats.description: Save bonus increases to +2.

feats.name: We Need You!
feats.description: If escalation die is 3+, two allies can roll a save.

feats.name: Arrow of Verse
feats.description: Recharge after battle is now 11+.

feats.name: Arrow of Verse
feats.description: Bonus dice and miss dice are now d12s.

feats.name: Battle Chant
feats.description: Use d6s instead of d4s for battle chant damage.

feats.name: Battle Chant
feats.description: Once per day, expend a recovery to reroll a battle chant attack.

feats.name: Battle Chant
feats.description: One battle per day, use d10s instead of d6s for battle chant damage.

feats.name: Befuddle
feats.description: Recharge check for befuddle now 6+.

feats.name: Befuddle
feats.description: Target of befuddle now only needs to be in sight.

feats.name: Befuddle
feats.description: On a hit, the confusion effect is now save ends.

feats.name: Overworld Two-Step
feats.description: Recharge check is 11+.

feats.name: Overworld Two-Step
feats.description: Far away allies can now also have their positions swapped.

feats.name: Song of Thunder
feats.description: Number of targets increases to 2d4.

feats.name: Song of Thunder
feats.description: Two of the targets can now be far away.

feats.name: Soundburst
feats.description: On a natural even hit, the dazed effect is now save ends.

feats.name: Soundburst
feats.description: Spell is now recharge 16+ after battle.

feats.name: Soundburst
feats.description: Spell now targets 1d4 + 1 enemies in a group.

feats.name: Vicious Mockery
feats.description: Hit effect is now a save ends effect.

feats.name: Vicious Mockery
feats.description: Recharge check for vicious mockery now 6+.

feats.name: Vicious Mockery
feats.description: Natural even miss doesn't expend vicious mockery.

feats.name: Wild Heal
feats.description: Wild heal is now recharge 16+ after battle.

feats.name: Wild Heal
feats.description: Add a third random target.

feats.name: Wild Heal
feats.description: Wild heal effect now provides free recoveries.

feats.name: Heal
feats.description: Target can now be nearby instead of ally you're next to.

feats.name: Heal
feats.description: If target is unconscious, add 1d10 x your Cha mod to recovery.

feats.name: Heal
feats.description: Add +30 hp to recovery if you're next to target.

feats.name: Domain: Healing
feats.description: Allies you heal can use your recoveries instead.

feats.name: Domain: Healing
feats.description: Invocation of healing provides 2 extra uses of heal that battle.

feats.name: Domain: Healing
feats.description: Allies you heal add triple your level hp instead of double.

feats.name: Domain: Justice OR Vengeance
feats.description: You can give the reroll blessing to yourself.

feats.name: Domain: Justice OR Vengeance
feats.description: When you gain a reroll blessing, gain two blessings instead of one.

feats.name: Domain: Justice OR Vengeance
feats.description: Gain a +4 bonus to the rerolled attack.

feats.name: Dom: Knowledge OR Lore
feats.description: Once per day, change knowledge skill roll to natural 20.

feats.name: Dom: Knowledge OR Lore
feats.description: Now use a d4 for invocation instead of d6.

feats.name: Dom: Knowledge OR Lore
feats.description: Gain a positive relationship point with different random icon each day.

feats.name: Domain: Life OR Death
feats.description: The death save bonus is now +2.

feats.name: Domain: Life OR Death
feats.description: Each battle, the first nearby ally that becomes staggered gains hit points equal to double your level.

feats.name: Domain: Life OR Death
feats.description: You gain one free use of resurrection.

feats.name: Domain: Love OR Beauty
feats.description: You gain a two-dice conflicted icon relationship instead.

feats.name: Dom: Protection OR Community
feats.description: One ally can roll a save each time you target allies with a spell.

feats.name: Domain: Strength
feats.description: Once per battle, deal bonus damage with melee attack, d4s equal to Strength modifier or level, whichever is higher.

feats.name: Domain: Strength
feats.description: Damage bonus dice are now d8s instead of d4s.

feats.name: Domain: Strength
feats.description: Once per day, the damage bonus dice are d20s instead of d8s.

feats.name: Domain: Sun or Anti-Undead
feats.description: Your attacks dealing holy damage gain a +1 damage bonus per tier.

feats.description: Gain a +2 bonus to all defenses against attacks by undead.

feats.name: Domain: Sun or Anti-Undead
feats.description: The Sun/Anti-Undead invocation also affects your allies' spells.

feats.name: Domain: Trickery OR Illusion
feats.description: Your trick die can now be used for any d20 roll.

feats.name: Domain: Trickery OR Illusion
feats.description: You get a free use of the trick die when the escalation die reaches 3+.

feats.name: Domain: War OR Leadership
feats.description: The domain power works with any attack now.

feats.name: Domain: War OR Leadership
feats.description: The attack bonus can now apply to multiple enemies you attack.

feats.name: Domain: War OR Leadership
feats.description: Your allies also get a damage bonus against the enemies you attack equal to double your Cha mod.

feats.name: Circle of Prot
feats.description: Spell is now recharge 16+ after battle instead of daily.

feats.name: Combat Boon
feats.description: The combat boon save automatically succeeds if the attack is a crit.

feats.name: Combat Boon

feats.name: Javelin of Faith
feats.description: Deals +1d6 damage vs. undamaged target. Increases at each tier.

feats.name: Javelin of Faith
feats.description: Spell can now target far away enemy with –2 attack penalty.

feats.name: Javelin of Faith
feats.description: Make the spell’s attack a second time when roll a natural 18+.

feats.name: Judgment
feats.description: Spell now deals half damage on a miss.

feats.name: Judgment
feats.description: Spell is now recharge 16+ after battle instead of daily.

feats.name: Mighty Healing
feats.description: This spell is now a close-quarters spell.

feats.name: Prayer for Readiness
feats.description: This spell is now a quick action to cast.

feats.name: Spirits of the Righteous
feats.description: You also gain the AC bonus.

feats.name: Turn Undead
feats.description: You can expend turn undead to gain an extra use of heal for one battle.

feats.name: Turn Undead
feats.description: Target demons or undead with turn undead.

feats.name: Turn Undead
feats.description: Increase target hp limit by 100 hp.

feats.name: Extra Tough
feats.description: Gain an additional recovery.

feats.name: Threatening
feats.description: Deal damage to enemies that fail to disengage from you equal to your Dex or Con mod; increases at 5th and 8th level.

feats.name: Threatening
feats.description: Non-mook enemies that fail to disengage from you are vulnerable.

feats.name: Cleave
feats.description: You can move to reach a new target before using your Cleave attack.

feats.name: Cleave
feats.description: Use Cleave twice each battle now (but only once per round).

feats.name: Cleave
feats.description: Gain a +4 bonus with Cleave attacks.

feats.name: Comeback Strike
feats.description: You don't take the –2 penalty for Comeback Strike attacks.

feats.name: Comeback Strike
feats.description: Once per day, use Comeback Strike twice in a battle.

feats.name: Comeback Strike
feats.description: Gain a +4 bonus with Comeback Strike attacks.

feats.name: Counter-Attack
feats.description: Counter-Attack attack now deals full damage.

feats.name: Counter-Attack
feats.description: Use Counter-Attack once per turn instead of per round.

feats.name: Counter-Attack
feats.description: Use Counter-Attack when escalation die is 3+.

feats.name: Deadeye Archer
feats.description: Spend a quick action before attack to add your Dex mod to the damage if you miss.

feats.name: Deadeye Archer

feats.name: Heavy Warrior

feats.name: Heavy Warrior

feats.name: Heavy Warrior
feats.description: Once per day, reroll a recharge roll for a magic armor power.

feats.description: Deal Power Attack damage even if you miss.

feats.description: Power Attack damage dice increase to 1d6 (1-H) or 1d8 (2-H).

feats.description: Add escalation die to Skilled Intercept saves.

feats.name: Skilled Intercept

feats.name: Tough as Iron

feats.description: Bonus increases to +3.

feats.description: Add double (1-H) or triple (2-H) the escalation die to miss damage.

feats.description: Add +4 instead of +2.

feats.description: The damage is no longer halved if the attack hits.

feats.description: Gain a +2 bonus to your never surrender save.

feats.description: Precision attack now works with ranged attacks.

feats.description: Stop the movement of the target of your punish them attack.

feats.description: Dazed effect is now weakened (11+ save ends).

feats.name: Second Shot
feats.description: The second shot attack only takes a –2 penalty.

feats.description: The attack bonus increases to +4.

feats.description: Once per day, use Bastion twice in a battle.

feats.description: Your ally takes no damage; you still take half.

feats.description: Choose 2 cleric spells to gain instead of one.

feats.description: You gain a +1 bonus to Physical Defense and a +1 bonus to Mental Defense.

feats.description: Lay on Hands healing uses a free recovery instead of one of your own.

feats.description: You can now track equally well in urban areas.

feats.name: Tracker
feats.description: You can now track flying, teleporting, and other difficult to find creatures.

feats.name: 2-Weap Mastery
feats.description: Add your level to damage with missed melee attacks.

feats.name: 2-Weap Mastery
feats.description: Make an opportunity attack against an enemy who rolls a natural 1 against you with a melee attack.

feats.name: 2-Weap Mastery
feats.description: One battle per day, add twice your level to damage with missed attacks.

feats.name: Animal Comp
feats.description: Once per day, companion can attack twice in a round.

feats.name: Animal Comp
feats.description: Once per day, companion can make an enemy disengage check fail.

feats.name: Animal Comp
feats.description: Once per day, reroll a companion's missed attack.

feats.name: Animal Comp
feats.description: Your companion adds the escalation die to its attacks.

feats.name: Animal Comp
feats.description: Once per day, companion can force a reroll that hits it.

feats.name: Animal Comp
feats.description: Your Lethal Hunter talent also applies to companion.

feats.name: Animal Comp
feats.description: Increase companion's PD and MD by +1.

feats.name: Animal Comp
feats.description: Increase companion's damage die by one size.

feats.name: Animal Comp
feats.description: Increase companion's AC by +1.

feats.name: Bear
feats.description: Gains twice its level in temporary hp with each hit.

feats.name: Snake
feats.description: Companion's ongoing damage increases to 3 x your level.

feats.name: Snake
feats.description: Companion's ongoing damage increases to 4 x your level.

feats.name: Sneak Attack
feats.description: Sneak Attack now works against lower initiative enemies in first round.

feats.name: Sneak Attack
feats.description: Sneak Attack now works against confused, dazed or weakened enemies.

feats.name: Sneak Attack
feats.description: Once per battle, replace normal miss damage with Sneak Attack damage.

feats.name: Trap Sense
feats.description: The attack reroll option can also apply to a nearby ally of the rogue.

feats.name: Trap Sense
feats.description: Gain a +3 bonus to skill check rerolls against traps.

feats.name: Trap Sense
feats.description: Take only half damage from trap attacks.

feats.name: Cunning
feats.description: Gain a +1 bonus to MD.

feats.name: Cunning
feats.description: Once per battle, reroll a save against an effect that hit you by overcoming your MD.

feats.name: Cunning
feats.description: As champion feat, but now reroll saves once per save.

feats.name: Imp. Sneak Atk
feats.description: Once per day, you can use Sneak Attack vs. an invalid target.

feats.name: Imp. Sneak Atk
feats.description: Once per day, roll d20s for your Sneak Attack damage instead of d8s.

feats.name: Imp. Sneak Atk
feats.description: One battle per day, ignore the once-per-round limitation for Sneak Attack damage.

feats.name: Murderous
feats.description: Gain +2 attack bonus vs. staggered enemies.

feats.name: Murderous
feats.description: Your crit range vs. staggered enemies expands by 2.

feats.name: Murderous
feats.description: Staggered enemies that make melee attacks against you and miss are vulnerable to your attacks.

feats.name: Shadow Walk
feats.description: On a miss, you can still use your move action normally.

feats.name: Shadow Walk
feats.description: Twice per day, reroll an attack following use of shadow walk.

feats.name: Shadow Walk
feats.description: Twice per day, return from shadow walk somewhere you wouldn't have been able to reach.

feats.name: Smooth Talk
feats.description: Add your Cha mod to your Smooth Talk save.

feats.name: Smooth Talk
feats.description: Success with Smooth Talk yields a 3-point positive relationship now.

feats.name: Smooth Talk
feats.description: On failed Smooth Talk save, you a get 2-point conflicted relationship.

feats.name: Thievery
feats.description: Gain thief's strike as a bonus power.

feats.name: Thievery
feats.description: Once per day, deal full damage with a thief's strike attack instead of half damage.

feats.name: Thievery
feats.description: Twice per level, steal with thief's strike things that can’t normally be stolen.

feats.name: Tumble
feats.description: Ignore the penalty for disengaging from more than one enemy.

feats.name: Tumble
feats.description: One battle per day, succeed on first disengage check each turn.

feats.name: Tumble
feats.description: Roll a hard save (16+) to tumble out of critical hits, taking damage equal to attacker' level instead.

feats.name: Assassin’s Gambit
feats.description: Once per turn, gain extra standard action with power if you drop a mook.

feats.name: Bleeding Strike
feats.description: Ongoing damage to large or huge targets is 1d6 per level instead.

feats.name: Bleeding Strike
feats.description: A natural even miss deals ongoing damage equal to your level.

feats.name: Bleeding Strike
feats.description: Can use bleeding strike against enemies taking ongoing damage.

feats.name: Deadly Thrust
feats.description: Add your Str mod to miss damage.

feats.name: Deadly Thrust
feats.description: You can now target mooks with deadly thrust attacks.

feats.name: Deadly Thrust
feats.description: Add 5 x Strength mod to hit damage, if you don't include Sneak Attack.

feats.name: Death’s Twin
feats.description: If your first death’s twin attack is natural 18+, you can also target the same creature with your second attack.

feats.name: Deflection
feats.description: Also triggers on a ranged attack vs. AC.

feats.name: Deflection
feats.description: Deflected attack now deals full damage.

feats.name: Deflection
feats.description: Using the power no longer spends your momentum.

feats.name: Evasive Strike
feats.description: If you drop target, you can pop free from all foes.

feats.name: Evasive Strike
feats.description: On a natural even hit, +2 bonus to AC and PD against the next attack.

feats.name: Evasive Strike
feats.description: As champion feat, but now also +2 MD.

feats.name: Flying Blade
feats.description: On a crit, target is also dazed.

feats.name: Flying Blade
feats.description: Attack roll doesn't have to be even for Sneak Attack damage.

feats.name: Flying Blade
feats.description: Use flying blade with ranged weapons.

feats.name: Roll With It
feats.description: Also triggers on attack vs. PD.

feats.name: Roll With It
feats.description: Also triggers on a ranged attack.

feats.name: Roll With It
feats.description: Once per day, take damage equal to attacker's level instead of half damage.

feats.name: Spiky Bastard
feats.description: Spiky bastard damage now applies while you’re staggered.

feats.name: Spiky Bastard
feats.description: Spiky bastard damage is 15 instead of 10 when esc. die is 3+.

feats.name: Sure Cut
feats.description: Missing with sure cut doesn't count as a use of Sneak Attack damage.

feats.name: Swift Dodge
feats.description: Also triggers on attack vs. PD.

feats.name: Swift Dodge
feats.description: Rerolled attack takes a –2 penalty.

feats.name: Swift Riposte
feats.description: If your attack crits, the enemy misses.

feats.name: Swift Riposte
feats.description: Gain a +2 bonus with swift riposte attacks.

feats.name: True Targeting
feats.description: Regain your momentum if the invisible enemy's attack misses.

feats.name: Breath weapon
feats.description: Failing a death save doesn’t cancel your breath weapon spells.

feats.name: Gather Power
feats.description: Once per battle, you choose a chaotic benefit.

feats.name: Gather Power
feats.description: Once per battle, gather power as a quick action if escalation die is 4+.

feats.name: Gather Power
feats.description: Roll 2 chaotic benefits if escalation die is 2+.

feats.name: Arcane Heritage
feats.description: Use Charisma as the attack ability for wizard spells.

feats.name: Arcane Heritage
feats.description: Cast wizard spells empowered.

feats.name: Blood Link
feats.description: Gain another relationship point with an icon in your heritage.

feats.name: Chromatic Heritage
feats.description: Gain +2 attack bonus with empowered breath weapon spells.

feats.name: Chromatic Heritage
feats.description: Once per day, turn a breath weapon re-use failure into a success.

feats.name: Chromatic Heritage
feats.description: One battle per day, gain resist dragon attack 16+.

feats.name: Fey Heritage
feats.description: Use your Fey Heritage power twice per day now.

feats.name: Fey Heritage
feats.description: Gain a +2 attack bonus vs. elves and creatures in elven sphere of influence.

feats.name: Fey Heritage
feats.description: Once per battle, gain racial ability of an elf race when esc. die is 6+.

feats.name: Infernal Heritage
feats.description: Gain resistance 12+ to fire and one other damage type.

feats.name: Infernal Heritage
feats.description: Increase one of your resistances to 16+.

feats.name: Infernal Heritage
feats.description: You can enter a spell frenzy as free action for free if esc die is 5+.

feats.name: Metallic Heritage
feats.description: Gain resist energy 12+ for rest of battle as quick action. You choose type.

feats.name: Metallic Heritage
feats.description: When your chaotic benefit increases your defenses, apply it to an ally.

feats.name: Metallic Heritage
feats.description: One battle per day, gain resist demon attack 16+ instead of resist energy.

feats.name: Sorc’s Familiar
feats.description: Familiar gains another randomly changing ability.

feats.name: Sorc’s Familiar
feats.description: Once per level, familiar can cast one of your expended spells.

feats.name: Sorc’s Familiar
feats.description: Familiar gains another randomly changing ability.

feats.name: Spell Fist
feats.description: When you miss with spell vs. engaged enemy, add Cha mod to miss damage. Damage increases at each tier.

feats.name: Spell Fist
feats.description: Once per battle, include an enemy engaged with you in a spell targeting other foes.

feats.name: Spell Fist
feats.description: Once per day, include all enemies engaged with you as targets of an empowered spell.

feats.name: Undead Heritage
feats.description: Decrease your total recoveries by 1; gain a +2 bonus to death saves.

feats.name: Undead Heritage
feats.description: Increases your resistance to 16+ and attack bonus vs. undead by +1.

feats.name: Undead Heritage
feats.description: Gain +1 attack bonus if you cut off hand and put out eye.

feats.name: Breath of Black
feats.description: On a miss, ongoing damage is now doubled.

feats.name: Breath of Blue
feats.description: The spell can now target a far away enemy.

feats.name: Burning Hands
feats.description: On a miss, deal fire damage equal to any die that rolled max.

feats.name: Burning Hands
feats.description: Choose another target for spell when you roll a natural 18+.

feats.name: Burning Hands
feats.description: Can now target all enemies engaged with you in addition to normal targets.

feats.name: Calling the Blood
feats.description: Roll two d6s, then choose the roll you want.

feats.name: Chaos Bolt
feats.description: No penalty for attacking a far away enemy.

feats.name: Chaos Bolt
feats.description: Roll on epic table for chaotic benefit, or choose it, depending on tier.

feats.name: Echoing Thunder
feats.description: Empowering echoing thunder doubles its aftershock damage.

feats.name: Lightning Fork
feats.description: Once per battle, reroll a lightning fork attack.

feats.name: Lightning Fork
feats.description: Lightning fork not expended if you miss all targets.

feats.name: Lightning Fork
feats.description: Recharge roll is now 11+.

feats.name: Resist Energy
feats.description: Add another target with the spell.

feats.name: Scorching Ray
feats.description: You can now target far away enemies, but with a –2 penalty.

feats.name: Scorching Ray
feats.description: The spell attack can deal random energy damage instead of fire.

feats.name: Scorching Ray
feats.description: No penalty for attacking a far away enemy.

feats.name: The Elven Shadows
feats.description: Once per battle, you can instead teleport to a far away location you can see.

feats.name: Ritual Magic
feats.description: Can cast full rituals in 1d3 + 1 rounds.

feats.name: Abjuration
feats.description: Bonus also applies to PD.

feats.name: Abjuration
feats.description: Gain 2d12 temp hp when you cast a daily spell.

feats.name: Abjuration
feats.description: Bonus also applies to MD.

feats.name: Cantrip Mastery
feats.description: You can now use cantrip-style versions of any spell you know.

feats.name: Evocation
feats.description: When you evoke, reroll one natural attack roll that is less than esc. die.

feats.name: High Arcana
feats.description: You can now cast counter-magic twice per battle.

feats.name: High Arcana
feats.description: You can cast counter-magic in reaction to any magical action.

feats.name: Color Spray
feats.description: The weakened effect hp threshold increases by 5 hp.

feats.name: Color Spray
feats.description: On a miss, deal damage equal to your level.

feats.name: Color Spray
feats.description: The spell now targets 1d3 + 1 creatures.

feats.name: Confusion
feats.description: You can choose a new miss effect that dazes all missed targets.

feats.name: Confusion
feats.description: Each failed save by the target deals 6d10 psychic damage to it.

feats.name: Confusion
feats.description: Confused effect now requires a difficult save (16+).

feats.name: Denial
feats.description: The target of the spell is also hampered on a natural even miss.

feats.name: Denial
feats.description: The spell now targets 1d4 + 1 enemies.

feats.name: Disintegrate
feats.description: The spell now targets a far away creature.

feats.name: Fireball
feats.description: Target 1d4 enemies instead of 1d3 when you cast the spell recklessly.

feats.name: Fireball
feats.description: The spell now targets 1d3 + 1 enemies.

feats.name: Force Salvo
feats.description: You can now target one creature with bolts until you hit it once.

feats.name: Force Salvo
feats.description: On a miss, deal damage equal to level with a bolt.

feats.name: Force Salvo
feats.description: Increase the number of bolts by 1.

feats.name: Hold Monster
feats.description: Regain the spell if you miss all targets with it.

feats.name: Hold Monster
feats.description: The spell can now target 2 enemies under the hp limit.

feats.name: Hold Monster
feats.description: Increase the hp limit by +50 hp.

feats.name: Lightning Bolt
feats.description: Deal 10 ongoing lightning damage on a natural even hit.

feats.name: Lightning Bolt
feats.description: Deal 20 ongoing lightning damage (hard save) on a natural even hit.

feats.name: Magic Missile
feats.description: Now choose two targets for the spell, each getting half damage dice.

feats.name: Magic Missile
feats.description: Roll a d20 with the spell to see if you crit.

feats.name: Magic Missile
feats.description: Use d8s instead of d4s for damage dice at spell levels 7 and 9.

feats.name: Meteor Swarm
feats.description: Damage from each meteor is now 5d4 x 10.

feats.name: Ray of Frost
feats.description: On a natural even hit, daze the target if it’s staggered.

feats.name: Ray of Frost
feats.description: The spell’s target can now be far away.

feats.name: Ray of Frost
feats.description: You can have the spell deal lightning or negative energy damage.

feats.name: Rebuke
feats.description: Deal double your level psychic damage when you roll a natural even hit.

feats.name: Rebuke
feats.description: Also daze a target (save ends) you hit with the spell.

feats.name: Rebuke
feats.description: Daze a target for a round when you roll a natural even miss.

feats.name: Shield
feats.description: You choose which attack roll the attacker must use.

feats.name: Shield
feats.description: The spell’s recharge roll is now 6+.

feats.name: Shield
feats.description: Hit or miss, take only half damage from attack you use shield against.

feats.name: Shocking Grasp
feats.description: Cast the spell as a quick action now.

feats.name: Shocking Grasp
feats.description: Once per battle, you can also daze a target you hit with the spell.

feats.name: Shocking Grasp
feats.description: Use d8s instead of d6s for the spell’s damage dice.

feats.name: Teleport
feats.description: You can now cast the spell on nearby allies; if allies are close, you can teleport to a location known by an ally.

feats.name: Teleport Shield
feats.description: When your teleport shield attack misses, the attack isn’t expended that round.

feats.name: Teleport Shield
feats.description: You can now teleport an enemy to a location far away you can see.

feats.name: Utility Spell
feats.description: Each utility spell slot lets you cast two spells.

feats.name: Utility Spell
feats.description: Each utility spell slot lets you cast three spells.

feats.name: Wizard’s Familiar
feats.description: Familiar gains another ability.

feats.name: Wizard’s Familiar
feats.description: Once per level, your familiar can cast one of your expended spells.

feats.name: Wizard’s Familiar
feats.description: Familiar gains another ability.
